overview: Vidyuth is a multifaceted professional, having worked in multiple industries at various capacities ranging from public relations to film-making and designing video-games. Before joining Entrupy, he managed Intuit India’s Public Relations and Communication division. He joins us with top-notch corporate experience and excels at sales and operations. At Entrupy, Vidyuth is entrusted with growing the business and is a core member of the team. He is currently based out of Bangalore.
